name: UICollectionViewFocusUpdateContext
desc: A context object that stores information specific to a focus update in a collection view.

items.name: var previouslyFocusedIndexPath: IndexPath?
items.desc: The index path of the collection view cell that previously had the focus.

items.name: var nextFocusedIndexPath: IndexPath?
items.desc: The index path of the collection view cell that is receiving the focus.
